|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM FA526 |cpu1_type_rev = ECONA |cpu1spd = 250 |cpu2chip1 = Star;STR9109; |cpu2_cores = |cpu2_type = |cpu2_type_rev = |cpu2spd = 250 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = STMicro;25P64V6P; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |flash2type = |fla2_num = |fla2chip = |flash2size = |flash2maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5DS16M16CS-5T; |ram1_num = 2 |ram2type = |ram2type1 = |ram2spd = |ram2size = 16 |ram2chip = Nanya;NT5DS8M16FS-5T; |ram2_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Star;STR9109; |sw1chip = Vitesse;VSC7385XYV; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:1C:10 |oui = 00:1C:10 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1 |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/09/2008 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B000H97UC0 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2860T; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2820L; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The manual on the Cisco-Linksys site says the default SSID is 'ciscosb'. :The manual in the FCC documents says the default SSID is 'linksys-n'. The wireless module is a ''SerComm'' device, board ID: YG300MOA-1.0 The [[Star]] STR9109 appears to handle the WLAN while :the STR9202 handles the Ethernet interfaces. :[[Star]] STR9202 ([[Cavium]] CNS1202) - 2GbE (internal) :[[Star]] STR9109 ([[Cavium]] CNS1109) - 1GbE (internal) :Vitesse VSC7385 (SparX G5) - 1GbE (WAN), 4 GbE (LAN), 1 GbE (internal) ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/routers/csbr/wrvs4400n/administration/guide/WRVS4400N_AG_OL-20048.pdf Administration guide] ===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/cisco/wrvs4400n_v2 ''Cisco WRVS4400n'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] 
Hardware Info
Architecture:	ARM
Vendor:		Cavium Networks
Bootloader:	ARMboot
System-On-Chip1:STR 9202 CPU: FA526id(wb) revision 1
CPU1/Speed	250 MHz
System-On-Chip2:STR 9109 CPU: FA526id(wb) revision 1
CPU2/Speed	250 MHz
Flash-Chip:	ST 25P64V6P
Flash size:	8 MiB
RAM		NT5DS8M16FS-6K/5T 128? MiB
RAM CPU1:	64 MiB
RAM CPU2:	16 / 32? MiB
Wireless:	RT2800 802.11n (Device ID: 1814:0601)
Ethernet:	Vitesse VSC7385 Gigabit w/ vlan support swconfig
Internet:	10/100/1000
USB:		No
Serial:		Yes
JTAG:		No
===Forum threads=== *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?25538-%CF%F0%EE%F8%E8%E2%EA%E0-%EE%F2-%FD%ED%F2%F3%E7%E8%E0%F1%F2%EE%E2-%E4%EB%FF-Linksys-WRT150N-610N-v2&p=248217#post248217 Pictures on the '''wl500g.info''' forums] *[http://www.hydrogenaudio.org/forums/index.php?showtopic=58720 ''Shell access on the WRVS4400N''] (linked from [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=22577 here on the '''DD-WRT''' forums]) *[http://homecommunity.cisco.com/t5/Wireless-Routers/stable-Firmware-for-WRVS4400N-with-working-IPv6/td-p/279867 ''Stable Firmware for WRVS4400N with working IPv6'' on the '''Linksys''' forums] :links to the firmware [http://www.tytec.de/Project4.htm here] [[Category:English Documentation]]
